      • check

        public int check(Card playerCard,
                 Card computerCard)
        check To check if two card's ranks are equal
        Parameters:
        playerCard - the player's card
        computerCard - the computer's card
        Returns:
        whether or not they're equal, 0 for player > computer, 1 for computer > player
